DOC.brief_summary: Patients admit heart failure provide discharge medication service pharmacist less likely readmitted within 30 day primary admission .
DOC.brief_title: Reducing 30-day Readmissions Patients With Heart Failure Through Pharmacist Discharge Medication Services
